articles.title: Fund manager has blunt words on Apple and its products
articles.content: One expert thinks the tech leader may be departing from its founder's legacy.

articles.title: Silent Giant TSMC Returns to the Peak of its Powers as the AI Boom Continues
articles.content: AI and U.S. growth stocks have rebounded to record highs after their slump in February and March, rewarding those who bought the dip, especially in the IT and AI sectors. At the heart of this resurgence is Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (TSM), better known as simply “TSMC”, the silent powerhouse behind the AI boom. The stock is within grasp of yet another historic high around the $225 mark. TSMC produces the chips that drive everything from Nvidia’s GPUs to Apple’s iPhones, and it’s now expe

articles.title: Exclusive-Foxconn sends 97% of India iPhone exports to US as Apple tackles Trump's tariffs
articles.content: NEW DELHI -Nearly all the iPhones exported by Foxconn from India went to the United States between March and May, customs data showed, far above the 2024 average of 50% and a clear sign of Apple's...

articles.title: Consumer sentiment, Regeneron meeting, Apple WWDC: What to Watch
articles.content: Market Domination Overtime hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton preview the top market stories and headlines Wall Street will be paying attention to tomorrow, Friday, June 13, including June's preliminary consumer sentiment reading, Regeneron Pharmaceuticals' (REGN) annual shareholder meeting, and the closing day of Apple's (AAPL) 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

articles.title: Apple Targets Spring 2026 for Release of Delayed Siri AI Upgrade
articles.content: (Bloomberg) -- Apple Inc. has set an internal release target of spring 2026 for its delayed upgrade of Siri, marking a key step in its artificial intelligence turnaround effort. articles.title: Here are Apple’s top AI announcements from WWDC 2025
articles.content: At WWDC 2025, Apple announced several AI features, such as a workout coach, live translation, and more.

articles.title: Apple fixes new iPhone zero-day bug used in Paragon spyware hacks
articles.content: The iPhone maker quietly updated a February security advisory to publicize a flaw that was used to hack at least two journalists in Europe.
